wanttoo.header: I want to use it too!
wanttoo.message: If you need help with the installation on your server, contact Transparency International EU. Their guide for how to install it can be found here: https://transparency.eu/how-to-install-lobbycal/https://transparency.eu/how-to-install-lobbycal/ If you are a developer, the code for lobbycal can be downloaded and installed from GitHub. You are very welcome to further contribute to the code!
